content:
Can you help me find the country in Europe with the longest coastline that doesn't border the Atlantic Ocean or the Mediterranean Sea? I have a list of European countries and their corresponding coastlines in kilometers:
country = ["Norway", "Russia", "Turkey", "United Kingdom", "Greece", "Italy", "Spain", "France", "Portugal", "Ireland", "Denmark", "Croatia", "Sweden", "Finland", "Belgium", "Germany", "Netherlands", "Poland", "Estonia", "Latvia", "Lithuania", "Slovenia", "Bulgaria", "Romania", "Ukraine", "Albania", "Montenegro", "Bosnia and Herzegovina", "Serbia", "Macedonia", "Slovakia", "Hungary", "Austria", "Switzerland", "Czech Republic"]
coastline = [25.148, 37.653, 7.200, 17.820, 13.676, 7.600, 4.964, 3.427, 1.793, 1.448, 7.314, 5.835, 3.218, 1.250, 66.5, 2.389, 451.8, 440, 379, 531, 90, 46.6, 354, 225, 2.782, 362, 12.5, 20, 193, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0]
Can you write a MATLAB code to find the country with the longest coastline that doesn't border the Atlantic or the Mediterranean?
